Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Customer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KiasuCustomer, PioneerCustomer, TypicalCustomer

    abstract class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract customer class which setups the necssary abstract methods and constructor for subclasses PioneerCustomer, KiasuCustomer and TypicalCustomer. Keeps track of waiting time and id.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int id
      The ID associated with this customer.
      private static int numOfCustomer
      The total number of customer created so far.
      private double serviceTime
      The service time required by this customer.
      private double timeStartedWaiting
      The time this customer start waiting in a queue.
      private double waitingTime
      The time this customer waited in a queue.

    • Field Detail

      • serviceTime

        private final double serviceTime
        The service time required by this customer.

      • timeStartedWaiting

        private double timeStartedWaiting
        The time this customer start waiting in a queue. 0 if this customer never joins a queue.

      • waitingTime

        private double waitingTime
        The time this customer waited in a queue. Only valid after stopWaitingAt() is called.

      • numOfCustomer

        private static int numOfCustomer
        The total number of customer created so far.

      • id

        private int id
        The ID associated with this customer.

        Record the time this customer starts waiting.

        public void stopWaitingAt​(double now)
        Record the time this customer stops waiting.
        Parameters:

      • getWaitingTime

        public double getWaitingTime​()
        Return the time this customer have waited for in the queue.
        Returns:
        the time spent waiting.

      • getServiceTime

        public double getServiceTime​()
        Return the time needed to serve this customer.
        Returns:
        the required service time.

      • joinQueue

        public abstract Queue joinQueue​(Shop shop)
        Abstract method that all subclasses must implement since all customers join queues.
        Parameters:
        shop - The shop being simulated (containing servers and queues).
        Returns:
        The queue which the customer is added to.

        Return a string representation of this customer.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The id of the customer prefixed with "C" as a string.
